MajorClaims.MC1: college and university should be available for all students who want to pursue their goal

Claims.C1: Students can have opportunity to learn, to practice, to gain more knowledge for their career and for their future
Claims.C2: college and university should consider students to study with them only if they are good students
Claims.C3: mediocre students should have opportunity to be trained in college and university

Premises.P5: moderate students should have a chance to try
Premises.P6: Everyone that has strongly ambition could pursue and success their goal even they are not classified as a good student because people can change
Premises.P7: With a good environment in college or university is encouraging students to study harder for a good future
